definition: structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
to score a try (sports)/to score a touchdown

sentences.english: A substitution matrix lets you assign match scores individually to each pair of symbols.
sentences.chinese: 使用置換矩陣能夠根據每對符號單獨分配匹配得分。

sentences.english: I have to learn how to score against the double-team , Yao said.
sentences.chinese: “我必須去學習怎樣在包夾的情況下得分，”姚明說。

sentences.english: I can rebound and I can score occasionally.
sentences.chinese: 我偶爾能夠搶到籃板球或投籃得分。

sentences.english: He scores, but what else can he do?
sentences.chinese: 他能夠得分，但他還能做什麼呢？

sentences.english: The general scores of social ability are higher than that of anti-society behavior.
sentences.chinese: 社會能力總體得分要高於反社會行爲。

sentences.english: I was really happy to score that goal.
One way Ersan scores is to get second chance points.
sentences.chinese: 厄桑的一個得分利器就是能夠把握二次進攻得分。

sentences.english: One way Ersan scores is to get second chance points.
sentences.chinese: 厄桑的一個得分利器就是能夠把握二次進攻得分。

sentences.english: The lowest Hofstede Dimension for the Netherlands is Masculinity (MAS) at 14.
sentences.chinese: 最低得分的一個維度是男性氣質取向，14。

sentences.english: You cannot give up that touchdown.
sentences.chinese: 你不能放棄那個觸地得分。

sentences.english: There are two meta-attitudes that can significantly increase your happiness score.
sentences.chinese: 有兩個基本態度，可顯著提高你的幸福得分。

sentences.english: A lot of the best point guards in the West are scoring PGs.
sentences.chinese: 西部很多最好的控衛都是得分型控衛。

sentences.english: Edge ball can help you to get the point immediately.
sentences.chinese: 擦邊球能幫助你立即得分。

sentences.english: I don't care about scoring titles and individual accolades any more.
sentences.chinese: 我不在乎得分王和個人的榮譽了。

sentences.english: Team A would score and then immediately retreat to its own end of the court.
sentences.chinese: A隊得分後立馬回撤到後場。

sentences.english: In northern Kenya, scores die every year in clashes over watering holes and cattle.
sentences.chinese: 在肯尼亞北部，每年死於得分超過澆水洞和牛的衝突。

definition: to hit the target with one's throw/(basketball) to score
(military) line of troops encircling an enemy position/(telephony) outside line/(basketball) outside the three-point line
to attack/to assault/to go on the offensive/attack/assault/offense (sports)
half of a game or contest/half-court
